recordTypes.name: Common Victualler License
recordTypes.description: An person who engages in the business of cooking, preparing and/or providing food for seated patrons on the premises must obtain this license from the Select Board.

recordTypes.name: Business Certificate
recordTypes.description: In accordance with MGL Chap. 110 Sec. 5, any person conducting business in the Town of Tewksbury under a name other than their own name is required to file a Business Certificate (commonly known as "Doing Business As" or "DBA") with the Town Clerk's Office.

recordTypes.name: RDA
recordTypes.description: Request for Determination of Applicability (RDA)

recordTypes.name: Public Works Permits
recordTypes.description: Please use this application to apply for Water Connection, Trench, Sewer Connection, Street & Sidewalk Opening, and Physical Alteration permits.

recordTypes.name: Animal Permit
recordTypes.description: Keeping of Animals and Piggeries. This permit will expire annually on April 30th.

recordTypes.name: Animal Registration
recordTypes.description: Registration for the keeping of 12 Hens OR 2-4 Rabbits

recordTypes.name: Building Permit Residential Short Form ( Roofing, insulation, doors and windows)
recordTypes.description:
This application is to apply for RESIDENTIAL ROOFING/WINDOWS/DOORS/WEATHERIZATION ONLY.

*** BUILDING PERMIT MUST BE PICKED UP AT THE BUILDING DEPARTMENT

recordTypes.name: DPW Public Service Request Form
recordTypes.description: Please use this form to submit Service Requests to the Department of Public Works.

recordTypes.name: Open Air Burning Permit
recordTypes.description:
Open Air Burning Permit

Burning may only be conducted from January 15th to May 1st of the year issued.

You are required to call the Open Burning Information Line 978-640-4419 each day you intend to burn, prior to burning. The information Line will advise you if open air burning is allowed for that day.  If burning is allowed, you will be prompted to record your street address and permit number for our daily record.

recordTypes.name: Residential Smoke Alarm/Carbon Monoxide Alarm Inspection  Application
recordTypes.description:
We conduct residential smoke alarm inspections on Tuesday/Thursday/Saturday mornings in a 9:00 am to 12:00 pm window. 

All smoke alarms must be under 10 years old.

All alarms need to be properly located and tested prior to the inspection. You will fail the inspection and be charged a $25.00 re-inspection fee if any smoke or CO alarm does not work due to a mechanical defect, has missing or dead batteries, or if your house numbers are missing or not visible from the street side of the house.

House numbers must be permanently affixed to the house by either nails or screws and they must be clearly visible from the street. House numbers affixed to doors or a mailbox alone do not meet this requirement.

For additional info and PDF guides please visit: 
https://www.tewksbury-ma.gov/225/Smoke-Carbon-Monoxide-Inspections

recordTypes.name: SYSTEM PERMIT- TESTING AND INSPECTION ONLY
recordTypes.description:
SYSTEM PERMIT- TESTING AND INSPECTION ONLY
This permit is required for TESTING AND INSPECTIONS

You must be a licensed professional to apply for this permit.

recordTypes.name: Water - Lead Service Inventory
recordTypes.description: Use this application to schedule a water service line identification appointment with a Town of Tewksbury Water Division.

recordTypes.name: NOI
recordTypes.description: Notice of Intent (NOI)

recordTypes.name: Entertainment License
recordTypes.description: Required if hosting a public show which includes dancing, whether by  performers or patrons, recorded or live music, television, an indoor and/or outdoor amplification system, theatrical play or a film screening, a floor show or light show, and any other audio or visual show.  And you are hosting a public show and plan to charge an admission fee.  Please refer to detailed requirements on application.

recordTypes.name: Class Auto License
recordTypes.description: This application pertains to a Class I, II or III Class Auto License.  Please check with Zoning/Building Department before applying to confirm you are in the correct zoning area for this type of business.

recordTypes.description: Residents with concerns regarding their water meter(s) should fill out this form to initiate a review and investigation by the Department of Public Works.

recordTypes.name: Hackney License
recordTypes.description: This application pertains to a Hackney License issued by the town to a person authorizing them to operate a for-hire vehicle, such as a taxi or livery vehicle, for the transportation of passengers.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit Residential
recordTypes.description:
This application is to apply for RESIDENTIAL building permits.
* NOTE: Please use SHORT FORM for Roofing/Windows/Doors/Weatherization
This application is used for new construction, renovations, alterations, siding, partial and interior demolition and major repairs to residential properties.

recordTypes.description:
This application is to apply for RESIDENTIAL building permits for SWIMMING POOL (INGROUND AND ABOVE GROUND POOLS)

*** BUILDING PERMIT MUST BE PICKED UP AT THE BUILDING DEPARTMENT

recordTypes.name: Road Race Permit
recordTypes.description: Required for all Road Race approvals.  Applicant must contact the Tewksbury Police Department for their initial review and approval.  Once approved, please either upload their approval letter or Police Dept. will contact our office directly with approval and guideline recommendations.

This application should be completed to apply for  COMMERCIAL building permits.

*** BUILDING PERMIT MUST BE PICKED UP AT THE BUILDING DEPARTMENT

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit-TEWKSBURY
recordTypes.description:
Only Licensed Electricians can apply for this permit.
 This permit is required when installing any electrical wiring, electrical appliances, electrical services, etc.  Also includes low voltage wiring including cable TV, internet, phones, security alarm systems, etc. 


Please refer to advisory regarding electrical installations completed without permit/inspections:

https://www.mass.gov/lists/board-policies-and-guidelines-examiners-of-electricians#advisory-regarding-how-to-rectify-electrical-installations-completed-without-required-permits-and-inspections-

recordTypes.name: Request to Extend an OOC
recordTypes.description: Request to Extend an Order of Conditions (OOC)

recordTypes.name: One-Day Entertainment License
recordTypes.description:
One-Day Entertainment License ONLY 

Entertainment Licenses approved subject to:

1.  Completed application 
2.  Scheduled Public Hearing with the Select Board
3.  Legal Notice published in the paper 7 days prior to Select Board Public Hearing
4.  Certified Abutter’s List from the Assessor’s Office and Abutter Notification

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit- TEWKSBURY
recordTypes.description: Only Licensed Journeyman and Master Plumbers may file for this permit. Electric Hot Water Heater(s) require a Plumbing Permit. Gas Hot Water Heater require a Plumbing and Gas Permit. This permit is required anytime the building’s plumbing is being installed, altered, removed, replaced or repaired.

recordTypes.name: Food Establishment Plan Review for New Construction or Major renovations
Gas Permit-TEWKSBURY
recordTypes.description: This permit is required anytime the building’s plumbing is being installed, altered, removed, replaced or repaired.  Only Licensed Plumbers, Gasfitters and LP Installers can apply for this permit. Gas Hot Water Heater(s) requires a Gas Permit and Plumbing Permits.

recordTypes.name: Automatic Amusement License
recordTypes.description: Any individual or business that is seeking to keep or operate Automatic Amusement Devices must have an approved license from the Select Board.

recordTypes.name: Liquor License
recordTypes.description:
Applications for all liquor licenses are available on the Alcoholic Beverage Control Commission (ABCC) website at the URL below. Applications must be filled out electronically and uploaded onto your application with the Select Board and all of the required attachments and fees.
 
https://www.mass.gov/apply-for-an-alcoholic-beverages-license-abcc

recordTypes.name: Sheet Metal Permit -TEWKSBURY
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when a sheet metal worker is manufacturing, fabricating, assembling, handling, erecting, installing, dismantling, alteration and/or repairing duct work, commercial fans, kitchen hoods and vents, architectural sheet metal and metal roofing.

If you are not a mobile truck/cart and want to apply for a temporary food permit, please use the temporary food permit application)
recordTypes.description:
Yearly Mobile food permits expire annually on December 31st. 
Yearly Mobile food permit fee is $150.00.
Temporary mobile food permit is $50 per event
